casebody.data:
NEW HAVEN PARKING AUTHORITY, et al.
v.
LONG WHARF REALTY CORPORATION, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Scott M. Schwartz, in support of the petition.

Clifford A. Merin and Joseph L. Rini, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38874) is denied.
